participant_1.background:
I remember playing the violin for my family at the holidays and seeing the look on their faces as they listened.
i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.

participant_2.background:
I have no children, but I do have a collection of little raincoat-wearing toys.
i like to listen to rap music.
I enjoy shopping and spending time with my dog, but I like to sleep in.
i have aspergers.
I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you?
I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing okay. I just finished watching a documentary about space.
Oh, that sounds cool! I love space documentaries.
Me too! I'm always fascinated by the vastness of space and the mysteries that it holds.
I know, right? It's so amazing to think about all the things that we don't know about.
It really is. I think it's important to keep exploring and learning about space.
I agree. It's one of the most important things we can do.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play the violin, listen to music, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those sound like fun things to do. I like to listen to music, read, and spend time with my dog.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into rap music right now.
Oh, that's cool. I like some rap music too.
What's your favorite song?
I don't know if I have a favorite song, but I really like "No Church in the Wild" by Kanye West and Jay-Z.
That's a good song! I like "Backseat Freestyle" by Kendrick Lamar.
I like that song too!
I'm glad you do. We should listen to some music together sometime.
That would be fun
